title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selection does not occur on the first attempt. 

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the library outline view. 
2. Try to select any item. 

Observed behavior: The item is not selected on the first attempt. 

Expected behavior: The item should be selected on the first attempt. 

Note: The item can be selected successfully on subsequent attempts.
OB: The item is not selected on the first attempt.
EB: The item should be selected on the first attempt.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item. Verify that the item is not selected on the first attempt.
